Instruction: Peel and cube sweet potatoes. Boil until tender, then mash.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, cook until softened.
Stir in black beans, cumin, chili powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes.
Combine mashed sweet potatoes with black bean mixture.
Spread about 1/4 cup of filling on each tortilla. Roll up tightly.
Pour enchilada sauce into a baking dish. Arrange enchiladas seam side down.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve with avocado slices, chopped cilantro, and lime wedges.
